general_summary: Squat analysis shows significant knee instability on your left side during descent. Focus on maintaining knee position to protect joints and build strength safely.
weaknesses: Left knee instability causing inward collapse

remedial_plan.name: Box Squats
remedial_plan.adaptive_reasoning: Teaches controlled depth while training knee stability. The box cue reinforces proper hip-hinge mechanics relevant to your form breakdown.

timeline_events.detailed_explanation: In this rep, your left knee collapsed inward to 145° (ideal:162°). Imagine screwing your feet into the floor to activate hip muscles and prevent hip sagging.
